Title: WSPDocGenerator
Description: Generate html documentation (msdn style) of WSP extracting content and reading manifest, features and all related information. Usefull to document every WSP and to understand what WSP deploy.
HomeWiki:
Welcome to WSPDocGenerator Project!

Project Description
Generate html documentation (msdn like) of WSP extracting content and reading manifest, features and all related information. Usefull to document every WSP and to understand what WSP deploy.

Compatible with SharePoint 2007, SharePoint 2010 and SharePoint 2013

 

Usage: WSPDocGenerator.exe <WSPs folder> <output folder>

Parameters:

  • <WSPs folder> wsp folder name
  • <output folder> folder used to generate documentation and extract WSP


Output:

  • In the output folder an html file for every wsp
  • In the output folder the html file 'WSP Documentation.html' with all WSPs information
